CustomField.description: This field is optional. It is driven by user selections within the spreading application. When "Standard Highlight" is selected, the spread statement record total (group total) is treated as a highlight that cannot be deselected by a user. When "User Highlight" is selected, the spread statement record total can be deselected by a user. If neither are selected, the spread statement record is not treated as a highlight. By default, this picklist is set to none.
CustomField.label: Highlights Type
